name: CirclesWorld
description:
Just a little experiment in drawing everything with circles, and placing them in kinda 3d way with the magic of trigonometry.

5 levels - there is a boss in the end :)

controls:

move: wasd / left stick
aim: mouse / right stick
shoot: mouse button / right trigger
dash: space / left trigger
pause: esc / select

made with LÖVE :)
